entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 2:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure: 97.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: NNE 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
